summary.format:
[![NuGet](https://img.shields.io/nuget/v/Microsoft.Identity.Client.svg?style=flat-square&label=Microsoft.Identity.Client&colorB=00b200)](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Identity.Client/) [![NuGet downloads](https://img.shields.io/nuget/dt/Microsoft.Identity.Client?style=flat-square)](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Identity.Client/)
`Microsoft.Identity.Client` is the core namespace that exposes the functionality included in the Microsoft Authentication Library for .NET.
